item.description:
Be sure to click "read more" to view some great links describing this powerful modality, which has been on planet before but deliberately eradicated by controlling beings because it is so powerful! These are also called the Freedom Teachings! (Also scroll forward on home page for descriptions of FREE monthly Keylontic Science study groups.)

This is the date of the first in a series of 4 classes included in this practitioner certification course.  Other dates are May 21, June 11, and July 9.  These are not posted seperately  here, since students must register and pay up front for all 4 class meetings. There are currently 6 students registered, although the count doesn't show here because payment was not made through this site. 

Payment quoted covers tuition  for all 4 classes, plus cost of materials (huge manual, technique CD, and numerous laminated color symbol code cards).

Payment can be made on the following site, where more class details are included: 

http://www.ulcsclinic.com/id5.html

 Check out the diagrams on following links:

http://www.katharateam.com/Nweb/Kathara_nw.htm

http://www.katharateam.com/Nweb/Kathara%20Healing%20Brochure.htm


The following info does NOT appear on the sites above, so it will be helpful to read on...

Also study the link at the end of this description here...order to get an idea about the depth of this truly AWESOME Advanced Energy Healing Modality!

 These details are especially important to regenerate one's original organic DNA encoding, as necessary to bring in the higher organic healing frequencies to adequately shield against devistating Metatronic energies arriving in 2012.

KS details come from newly translated Maharata Texts which were preserved by the Emerald Order of the Melchizedek Cloister, and published by the Azurite Press.

Steady application of KS Techniques shield against disharmonic frequencies while facilitating personal healing, DNA template regeneration and activation, consciousness expansion, and much more!  

 This course covers the multi-dimensional structure of the Cosmos in which we reside, as well as multiple layers of our bio-spiritual anatomy.

 Register now, to learn how to use the ancient science of light, sound, and mathematical symbol codes of consciousness to facilitate core level healing! 

Discover the energetic structure and function of your multi-dimensional energy bodies, as governed by encoding within your KatharaTM Grid (the original Tree of Life).

See where your shields are located, as well as your 15 chakras which correspond to 15 dimensions comprising 5 density levels. Access and direct frequencies from the 12th dimension and above, to reset all distortions in your energy bodies, DNA encoding,  and morphogenetic template.

Discover the nature and location of axiatonal lines (from which acupuncture meridians manifest), and various levels of  hova bodies (perceived as auras).

 KatharaTM can be used alone, or in conjunction with other modalities.

Learn how to activate your 6th & 7th senses to receive accurate answers to any questions you may have. 

Activate your higher sensory perception (HSP) to scan others for miasmic blockages.

Make use of colorful mathematical symbol codes and sound tones to clear miasms for core-level healing.

Last session is a practicum where students work on each other, scanning  aura's and KatharaTM spheres to locate each other's miasms, and then clearing them.

Students receive free levels 1 & 2 energetic initiations, opening the channels of communication with their own soul and over-soul levels of identity.

 A formal definition of Kathara appears below:

 

 http://www.keylonticdictionary.org/Words/K/Kathara%20Healing.htm

KatharaTM Level 1 is the Foundations Course for all further studies in Keylontic Science (KS), important to understand regardless of one's career goals.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up the first driveway and enter through the front door. Classroom is downstairs. If you get lost, call 603-286-8191.
item.why: Kathara(tm) Level 1 is the Foundations Course for all further studies in Keylontic Science (KS), important to understand regardless of one's career goals. These details are VITAL to prepare for what's really going to happen in 2012 also.
item.name: Kathara Level One Certification Course (Price Includes Materials plus 4 Classes)
